title: Key Fragment Drop
body: Hello, I logged into League this morning to find that I had gotten a key fragment, and then another notification popped up after I closed it saying I got a key fragment. However, when I looked at my loot, there was only one key fragment there?

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and only see the single key fragment earned.  The other notification may have actually been your reward for the old honor system, which is the Great Leader icon!  :D  Grats!
